about.text: As an aspiring graphic designer, I am driven by a deep passion for creating visually compelling content.

Graphic design has been a natural extension of my passion for drawing and abstract painting. Though my experience with grahphic design spans just several months, I have dedicated countless hours to improving my skills in design tools in Adobe Creative Suite and Figma, and leveraging AI to enhance my visuals and drawing an inspiration from it. The illustration of colorful waves emanating from a head on my website portfolio is a piece I crafted myself.
At the moment, I’m designing a meditation website, I’m taking part in a logo design contest as well as reading design literature to improve my designing skills.
Through design, I also embark on a journey of self-discovery, gaining insights into my own artistic voice and identity.

My dedication to learning and hands-on projects demonstrates my commitment to excellence in the field of graphic design. I am excited to continue growing and exploring new avenues within this dynamic and fulfilling field.

text: This logo was created as a submission for a design contest. It was a carpenter company, hence the “J” shaped as a shaving.
Company requirements: Blue logo with purple/orange in it, minimal and modern.
The logo was not selected and is not currently in use by the company. This work is included in my portfolio to showcase design skills.

Logo for a meditation website, there is a kneeling man in a circle who symbolizes meditation. The circle is a symbol of a sun and of a shape frequently used as a meditation, yoga and psychology symbol.
The logo on the website is interactive with hover effect that causes the logo to change colour to match colours of the website and fuctions as a home-page link.
I designed a condensed logo using my initials for my website portfolio.
The logo features round shapes for a soft look and I added part of the letter K as a sharp-edged shape to contrast the letter O. My idea was for the letter K to partially come out of the letter O.
